title: Minami-ke Betsubara
original_name: みなみけ べつばら
opening_song: "Shunka Shuutou Festival (春夏秋冬フェスティバル)" by Rina Satou, Marina Inoue, and Minori Chihara
ending_song: "Arigatou Sankyu (ありがとうサンキュ)" by Rina Satou, Marina Inoue, and Minori Chihara
sinopse: Valentine's Day is approaching; Hosaka is still trying to express his love to Haruka by cooking, cross-dressing Mako-chan fears to be found out, Kana-"sensei" teaches the other girls how to "win" Valentine's Day, and Fujioka is desperately trying to receive Kana's chocolate.
